testCase.requirementText: File reference to descriptive metadata mets/fileSec/fileGrp/file/@DMDID If descriptive metadata has been provided per file this attribute refers to the fileâ€™s descriptive metadata by ID.
testCase.description: This attribute has the cardinality of 0..1 and moscow-level MAY which is also the case in METS.xsd. There could be a test to see how many files have original file IDs, but this is at a nice-to-have-level and not really a requirement so all in all there are no rules connected with this testcase
